html:
Jan 27 (Reuters) - The following are the top stories on the New York Times business pages. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.


- Moderna Inc MRNA.O said on Wednesday it has begun a study of a booster shot designed specifically to fend off Omicron. https://nyti.ms/3ubRFii


- The EU General Court in Luxembourg on Wednesday threw out a $1.2 billion fine issued against Intel Corp INTC.O more than a decade ago over practices to undercut Advanced Micro Devices Inc AMD.O in the semiconductor industry. https://nyti.ms/3o5ALhB


- Mattel Inc MAT.O said on Wednesday it had won back the license to produce dolls and toys based on the Walt Disney Co's DIS.N popular ice princesses Elsa and Anna from the "Frozen" movie franchise. https://nyti.ms/3IIdl9S


- Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O on Wednesday, settled a price-fixing investigation by the Washington State attorney general's office by agreeing to pay a $2.25 million fine and end a program that gave it control over the prices of products supplied by third-party sellers on its marketplace. https://nyti.ms/3IGvAfT


(Compiled by Bengaluru newsroom)

(( globalnewsmonitoring@thomsonreuters.com ))
